title: Episode 865 - Special Guest Skid Row Cop Deon Joseph
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Dan Hollaway and Rob Fox are joined by LAPD officer Deon Joseph to discuss his decades-long career policing Los Angeles's famed Skid Row, what he thinks the solution to policing the homeless and mental health are based on his experiences, and his new boo...
itunes:summary:
Dan Hollaway and Rob Fox are joined by LAPD officer Deon Joseph to discuss his decades-long career policing Los Angeles's famed Skid Row, what he thinks the solution to policing the homeless and mental health are based on his experiences, and his new book 'Stepping Across the Line: A Skid Row Cop's Story'.
